byline.contributor: Sewell Chan and Melissa Eddy contributed reporting.

abstract: United Nations officials announce that final draft of Paris climate pact is ready to be presented to ministers after nearly two weeks of tense negotiations; support of every nation, no matter how small or poor, is required for approval.
lead_paragraph: Officials said negotiators in Paris had agreed on new language for a pact that will be presented Saturday to diplomats from 195 nations.

headline.main: Draft of Climate Pact Is Ready, U.N. Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Amid Divisions, Optimism for a Climate Deal

snippet: Officials said negotiators in Paris had agreed on new language for a pact that will be presented Saturday to diplomats from 195 nations.

keywords.value: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
keywords.name: subject
